entry.title: WIND WARNING , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 07:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 9.9°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait early this morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then southwest 20 near noon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
